english.segment1: I am nothing more than nothing . In comparison to You. I am nothing more than nothing. But in You I am made whole . Through You I will find life
english.segment2: Chorus: It's in Your presence, Lord . That I feel most at home . It's when I'm nearest to you . I find strength to carry on . And it's better than good
english.segment3: You are everything that I could ever want . And nothing I desire compares to You . You are everything that I could ever want . And nothing I desire compares to You . But in You I am made whole . Through You I will find life
english.segment5: You are so amazing . You are perfect for me . You are everything I need. You are so amazing . You are perfect for me . You are everything I need
english.segment6: It's in Your presence, Lord . That I feel most at home . It's when I'm nearest to You . I find strength to carry on . Your present tense reminds me I am not alone.  And it's better than good
english.segment7: Psalm 63:3, Acts 17:25, 2 Peter 1:3. Will Goodwin, 2004 Mary Street Music (ASCAP).
